original_title: 輪姦計画 美人受付嬢編 初川みなみ
overview: I was meeting to travel with three guys, but it was canceled in a hurry. Because I found a super nice girl at the meeting place, so I'm going to pick you up! ! We get along well (?) and make a lot of noise, and at night we have a 3-on-1 joint party. I couldn't go on a trip, but it was the most exciting day! !
title: Orgy Planning. The Beautiful Receptionist Edition. Minami Hatsukawa
